column4: Traffic;Kratie Province: At around 4:00 AM on August 11
column6: a black Highlander car with license plate Phnom Penh 2C-1408 carrying luxury wood crashed
column7: causing man to die.------According to the information from the people at the scene
column8: it is said that the driver fell into a ditch at O ​​Bek Chan point
column11: Kratie province.------A source familiar with the vehicle said that the vehicle belonged to a well-known trader named
column12: who had been involved in the illegal timber business for a long time.------The same source said that members of the trader’s group drive at high speed when transporting illegal timber. ------NKD------ (Warning- images of scene) ------AREY
